subject: Hockey, Ice
College Athletics
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The boom in American hockey talent is strikingly apparent with a quick glance at the University of Michigan roster. Only three Canadians skate for Coach Red Berenson’s No. 1-ranked Wolverines.
snippet: The boom in American hockey talent is strikingly apparent with a quick glance at the University of Michigan roster. Only three Canadians skate for Coach Red Berenson’s No. 1-ranked Wolverines.
